resources.string: This App cannot working without connection internet, please check your internet connection
Please enable your GPS service, App cannot pin point nearest Culinary tour without knowing your current location
Seems like your device does not support to run this app,The minimum API level supported by the HERE SDK for Android is API 21, Android 5.0 (Lollipop)
Cannot initialize map, please try again...
Cannot load data nearest Culinary tour, please try again...
Cannot load detail data Culinary tour, please try again...
Oops something wrong happened, please try again...

App Version v1.0

This is location where you at now,
btw this is app to make easy for you to find Culinary tour near your location.
Navigate to next Culinary tour, just swipe away the current stack
This is Routing page. to move camera to your position, press circle icon with x inside of it, to focus on navigate press arrow button
